scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.keycloak-save-config: docker exec $(docker ps -f name=keycloak -q) /opt/keycloak/bin/kc.sh export --realm taskmanager --dir /opt/keycloak/data/import
scripts.ci:all: npm ci && npm ci --prefix frontend && npm ci --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
